itunes:title: Episode 859 - UFC 264 Preview With Jon Anik
title: Episode 859 - UFC 264 Preview With Jon Anik
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, Dan Regester, and Papa G are joined by UFC and MMA commenter Jon Anik in Las Vegas to preview UFC 264 -- including what Anik is looking for when Conor McGregor squares off against Dustin Poirier, how big McGregor-Poirier 3 i...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, Dan Regester, and Papa G are joined by UFC and MMA commenter Jon Anik in Las Vegas to preview UFC 264 -- including what Anik is looking for when Conor McGregor squares off against Dustin Poirier, how big McGregor-Poirier 3 is for UFC, and what he expects from the other fighters on the card like Sean O'Malley and Gilbert Burns.
